2020 Annual Report

Innovating for a better tomorrow

Sustainability

“Being green is in our DNA. Sustainability is at the intersection of what’s best for the environment, for our employees, for our customers, for the communities we are in, and for our shareholders. We are proud of the progress we have made over the last 9 years, to set ourselves apart as the sector leader in renewable energy initiatives.”

GRESB Real Estate Assessment

  1. Environmental

  2. Environmental

    • Glassdoor: 2020 Best Places to Work Winner
    • Glassdoor: 2019 Top CEO
    • Part of the Women’s Leadership Institute’s “ElevateHer Challenge” to support advancing women in the workplace
    • Recognized by the 2020 Women on Boards group for having over 20% of our board female
    • 85 engagement score on annual employee survey
    • New Diversity and Inclusion committee, commitment and initiatives
    • Received a Platinum Award from The Utah Worksite Wellness Council for employee wellness efforts
    • Partnered with Western Governors University to offer new education assistance program for employees seeking an undergraduate degree allowing employees to graduate with low, to no cost
    • Forbes 2020 The Best Employers for Diversity Winner
